channel.title: Nature Communications
channel.description:
Nature Communications is an open access, multidisciplinary journal dedicated to publishing high-quality research in all areas of the biological, health, physical, chemical and Earth sciences. Papers published by the journal aim to represent important advances of significance to specialists within each field.

We are committed to providing an efficient service for both authors and readers. Our team of independent editors make rapid and fair publication decisions. Prompt dissemination of accepted papers to a wide readership and beyond is achieved through a programme of continuous online publication.

channel.prism:copyright: © 2025 Macmillan Publishers Limited, part of Springer Nature. All rights reserved.

item.title: Melanin-like nanofibers with highly ordered structures achieve ultrahigh specific electromagnetic interference shielding efficiency
item.content:encoded:
Nature Communications, Published online: 03 August 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-62367-9

Lightweight electromagnetic shielding materials are of interest, though it is challenging to balance performance and processability with conventional materials. Here, the authors report, an ordered melanin-like polymer, using π–π stacking, for a microwave shielding material.
item.dc:title: Melanin-like nanofibers with highly ordered structures achieve ultrahigh specific electromagnetic interference shielding efficiency
item.dc:creator: Peng Chen
Shibo He
Tianyou Wang
Chencan Wang
Junru Tao
Yiwen Li

item.title: Reconfigurable non-Abelian integrated photonics
item.content:encoded:
Nature Communications, Published online: 02 August 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-62481-8

Non-Abelian integrated photonics exploits the non-Abelian holonomy principle, giving rise to robust and broadband on-chip photonic devices. Here, authors propose a reconfigurable non-Abelian photonic chip where the non-Abelian functionality can be reprogrammed by employing the thermal-optic effect.
item.dc:title: Reconfigurable non-Abelian integrated photonics
item.dc:creator: Shijie Sun
Xibin Wang
Shangrong Li
Daming Zhang
Qi-Dai Chen
Xu-Lin Zhang
